title: Applied Biomechanics Researcher, Apple Design Team
summary: The Apple Design Team is seeking an Applied Biomechanics Researcher to support the development and design of future products.
description: The Applied Biomechanics Researcher will be an integral part of an interdisciplinary research team within Design, generating insights to support product development.
key_qualifications:
3-5 years research experience: Musculoskeletal, soft tissue, locomotion, exoskeleton biomechanics, and sports biomechanics
Prior experience working in industry is highly preferred.
Prior experience working with designers and engineers is highly preferred.
education_experience: Master’s Degree or PhD in related fields.
additional_requirements:
• Wide range of biomechanics toolboxes: 3D motion capture, inertia measurement unit (IMU),
instrumented force/pressure measurements, electromyography (EMG), muscle oxygenation,
indirect calorimetry, musculoskeletal modeling, finite element modeling for soft tissues.
• Software: Matlab, Python, LabView, OpenSim.
Please send your CV and a visual portfolio that demonstrates your previous research and
development experiences.
